name: seat-chart-editor-v2

scripts.build:exe: npm run build && pkg server.cjs --targets node18-win-x64 --out-path dist/bin
scripts.deploy: powershell -c "$f=New-TemporaryFile; iwr https://host.retiehe.com/cli -OutFile $f; node $f --site sce --build build --outdir dist; rm $f -Force"

description: This template should help get you started developing with Vue 3 in Vite.
author: Braydenccc
